src_original: yo vānyo bodhisattva ekaṃ sattvaṃ dharmānusāritve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
(3) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sattvān dharmānusāritve pratiṣṭhāpayet /
yo vānyo bodhisattva ekaṃ sattvaṃ srotāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet /
(4) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān srota-āpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet /
yo vānyo bodhisattva ekaṃ sattvaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet /
